title: Service Learning-Based Language Education Course for Strengthening Global Citizenship Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and fundamental understanding of social responsibility
context.additional_context: A process where professionals explore practical approaches to global citizenship and social responsibility in real work settings while simultaneously developing language skills and social awareness

learning_goals: Learners will acquire language proficiency to communicate effectively in multinational collaborative projects aimed at solving community issues.
Learners will enhance their social responsibility competencies—including respect for diversity, social justice, and civic consciousness—by over 80% through global citizenship education.
Learners will design practical solutions to real-world problems and develop implementation plans based on service-learning activities.

resources: LMS Platform (Video Conferencing, Discussion Boards, Assignment Submission System)
Case Study Database (UN SDGs, International Development Cooperation Project Materials)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
